response.overview: On the hottest day of the summer, a loud, rule-breaking young man and his best mate decide to cause chaos at a brand-new water park. What starts as queue-jumping and showing off quickly turns into something far darker when one reckless decision shocks everyone watching. As the day spirals out of control, he begins to believe he can change the world itself â€” and nothing will ever be the same again.
response.tagline: From water slides to world power.
response.title: Carnage and Utopia
